title: Pink Horizon Consulting
description: I co-designed the Pink Horizon Consulting logo and brand identity through multiple feedback rounds, then designed and built their WordPress marketing site using a bespoke theme template.
bullets: Co-designed the logo and brand identity alongside the founder, coordinating with print design work to keep the visual system consistent.
Designed and built a WordPress marketing site on a bespoke theme template for a polished, on-brand web presence.
Delivered responsive page layouts and reusable templates to support future updates and growth.
